issue.title: [CI] Use more recent Miniconda on AppVeyor
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-7566](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-7566). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
A newer conda might improve setup speed because of the new package format.

comments.body:
